name: Vaping Simulator: Pepe Edition
description:
Vaping Simulator 2K17!

Experience the most beautiful, truly amazing and yet realistic experience by being a Papi tha frog, discovering various vape mods and escaping from cutest enemies ever! You will be able to experience widely custom-made open world, various pick-up mods and enemy-kittens.

This game being an open world, means you can do whatever you want!Current key features:
  • Open world
  • Cute enemies
  • Papi the frog controller (Realistic physics)
  • Mod pick-up System
  • Vehicles
  • Papi's Health System
Features to come:
  • Multi-Player
  • Dabbing
Controls:
  • Use W A S D in order to navigate the character.
  • Use Left-Shift to accelerate.
  • Press "Tab" to fix camera's position.
  • Use Mouse to look around.
  • Press Space to jump.
  • E to enter the vehicle.
  • F to exit the vehicle.
Disclaimer:
Vaping Simulator does not promote any type of smoking or vaping. Do not attempt trying if you are underage. Or better stay out of it if possible.
